quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Meitu Inc is an investment holding company that provides imaging products and services. The Company operates three segments. The Photo, Video and Design Products segment provides self-service ID photo production services, and its artificial intelligence (AI) applications include Meitu, BeautyCam, Wink, DesignKit, Action, MOKI, and others. The Advertising segment provides advertising, mobile value-added service products and advertising agency services to advertisers. The Solutions for Beauty Industry segment is engaged in the sale of cosmetics to distributors and retailers, the provision of enterprise resource management software as a service (SaaS) system to cosmetics stores and the sale of a series of smart hardware products. The Others segment is primarily engaged in content marketing solutions business. The Company mainly conducts its businesses in the domestic market and overseas markets.
